metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14939 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in savestruct_internal.c in FreedroidRPG 1.0rc2.Saved game files are composed of Lua scripts that recover a game's state. Afile can be modified to put any Lua code inside, leading to arbitrary codeexecution while loading.

criterions.comment: freedroidrpg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
